alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 4:39PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elko County through 515 PM PST... At 438 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 7 miles north of Spring Creek, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamoille, Spring Creek and Secret Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County
